change.when: "Identifier(s) of the text on the artefact(s)
change.who: part: if there is more than one text on the artefact
part:Identifier of the conglomerate artefact to which the artefact pertains
part:Identifier of the monument to which the artefact pertains

resourceManagement.corpus: write ""yes"" if you're encoding a case of reuse"

alternative.artefactDes: Iconography and/or decoration observed on the artefact — free text

artefactFormat.diameter: Default value 'not applicable'. Replace by yes or no in case of presence/loss of seal(s)
artefactFormat.weight: Height or diameter of the seal matrix

copperplateWeightOther.p: Width or diameter of the seal matrix

sealingTechnique.value: #Description of what is known or recorded about the origin and subsequent history of the artefact (free text)

remarks.p: Name of the place where the artefact was originally exposed — don't fill in if place ID is already available

originExhibPlace.status: ID of the place where the artefact was originally exposed
originExhibPlace.id: ID of the place where the artefact was discovered

originExhib.originExhibPlace: Place where the artefact was discovered — don't fill in if place ID is already available

artefactDescription.discoveryPlace: Coordinates if you have specific topographic dataeId> date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)

preservationPlace.inventoryNumber: date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)

preservationEvents.when: date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)
date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)

preservationEvents.type: Institution or private person authorizing access to the artefact

artefactRights.rightHolder: Identifier(s) of the related surrogate(s). Use $ to separate the identifiers.
artefactRights.artefactDistributionRights: Identifier(s) of the related digital image(s). Use $ to separate the identifiers.

surrogateID.idno: Link(s) to related images stored on external repository. Use to separate the identifiers.
